title: Amberflo Metering / Billing
description: Amberflo is a usage metering and billing service. This policy allows you to send metering calls for each API to their meter ingest endpoint.

export.description: The name of the exported type

options.description: The options for this policy. Many of them can be overriden at the code level in a request using the `AmberfloMeteringPolicy.setRequestProperties` method.

apiKey.description: The API key to use when sending metering calls to Amberflo

meterApiName.description: The name of the meter to use when sending metering calls to Amberflo (overridable in code)

meterValue.description: The value to use when sending metering calls to Amberflo (overridable in code)

customerIdPropertyPath.description: The path to the property on `request.user`contains the customer ID. For example `.data.accountNumber` would read the `request.user.data.accountNumber` property.

customerId.description: The default customerId for all metering calls - overridable in code and by `customerIdPropertyPath`

dimensions.description: A dictionary of dimensions to be sent to Amberflo (extensible in code)

statusCodes.description: A list of successful status codes that should trigger a metering call to Amberflo - defaults to `result.ok` (200-299).

url.description: Optional, the URL to send metering events to (defaults to https://app.amberflo.io/ingest). This is useful for testing purposes.
